Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory300.png'}
{3: 'You make your way into a lush forest, quietly amazed that Constellia has preserved such a vast stretch of green.'}
{3: "Cicadas buzz incessantly, and in the near distance, pairs of fireflies drift by. It's tough to tell whether they're mechanical replicas or genuine insects living here."}
{3: 'As you pass by a patch of short shrubs, you catch the sound of voices not too far away.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Marry, our play is "The most lamentable comedy and..."'}
{3: "The voices are hardly discernible amid the cicadas' constant buzz."}
{2: '(Step in closer)', 3: '10'}
{2: '??', 3: '...call forth your actors by the scroll. Masters, spread yourselves.'}
{3: 'These lines sound so familiar.'}
{3: 'As your vision sharpens alongside the sound, you spot several mechanoids rehearsing something in a clearing in the woods.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Following the voice, you notice a girl sitting neatly on a stone, nodding at you in greeting.'}
{3: 'She shifts to create space, inviting you to sit beside her.'}
{2: '"A Midsummer Night\'s Dream"?', 3: '21', 4: 'The lines feel so familiar.', 5: '22'}
{3: 'Selena gives a gentle nod.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: '"A Midsummer Night\'s Dream"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "We're rehearsing a play set in the forest, right here among the trees.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The mechanoid performers act like they're all alone, as though this isn't just a rehearsal spot but a natural theater shaped by the forest itself."}
{2: "It looks like we're the only ones watching this time.", 3: '26'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "That is, if we don't count the birds, insects, and plants.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A single petal, carried by the breeze, comes to rest beside her loose hair.'}
{3: 'With that, the two of you become part of the performance too.'}
{3: "After a moment's silence, you both turn your gaze to the mechanoid performers."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'What is Pyramus—a lover or a tyrant?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "It's not my first time watching this play, but I still want to keep going.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Every time it's performed, you would feel something new.", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Even the author might see his earlier works in a different light.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "But I'm still not sure if I should look back on what I've written before.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl turns to you, showing almost no emotion.'}
{3: "As your eyes meet, you can't see the past she hides, nor can you catch what's going on in her mind right now."}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I know exactly how it feels to stand in that same spot...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'In those moments, I could still talk with you about the characters, the storyline, or the fate and choices of every character involved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'If you want, we can still do that—even now.', 3: '44'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "It's okay, Conductor.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "I'm hoping that, at least for tonight, no one's out there planning or debating our future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "So let's just let things happen as they do.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Otherwise, we wouldn't be having this unexpected encounter, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selena offers a gentle smile, as clear and refreshing as a flowing stream.'}
{3: 'The mechanoids continue their performance, seemingly undisturbed by the conversation in the audience.'}
{3: 'You stay silent in unspoken harmony with Selena.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'Such a fleeting moment...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The scene is drawing to a close.', 3: '58'}
{3: 'Selena sighs softly and stands up. Under the starlight, an iris flower stands tall.'}
{3: "She pulls out a pen from somewhere—it's clearly battered, making it hard to tell if it's been with her all along or salvaged from some ruined place."}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Conductor, may I have your hand?', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Extend your hand)', 3: '65'}
{2: '(Extend your hand)', 3: '64'}
{3: 'You hesitate for a moment but do as she asks.'}
{3: "Selena opens your palm, and a gentle breeze carries a subtle hint of her hair's delicate scent."}
{3: "Selena opens your palm, and a gentle breeze carries a subtle hint of her hair's delicate scent."}
{3: 'A slight prickling runs across your palm, tickling just enough to make you aware of the sensation.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Please, don't peek yet.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives a slight bow.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'The lost lover is bound to arrive, and the mischievous fairy shall drip pansy nectar here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Before we meet, even if it's the most lamentable comedy, I'll carry it through to the final curtain, Conductor.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "What is Thisbe—a wand'ring knight?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'It is the lady that Pyramus must love.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The performance continues, and a hush settles for a while. The hand she asked to hold is already growing clammy.'}
{2: '(Slowly open your palm)', 3: '80'}
{3: "She doesn't react, which silently confirms her approval."}
{3: 'Just a few simple words, and yet they bridge countless ages...'}
{3: 'A reply letter, fated to go missing yet again, appears right in front of you.'}
{3: 'On this midsummer night, you carry a subtle but peculiar emotion as you gently blow the ink on your hands dry.'}
